results.content: It's definitely not for a beginner. Some crucial steps where not mentioned and I had to spend hours trying to figure out how it wasn't working for me. It went very fast.
results.content_html: It's definitely not for a beginner. Some crucial steps where not mentioned and I had to spend hours trying to figure out how it wasn't working for me. It went very fast.

results.content: I enjoyed the experience and found the instructions clear. I need to still become familiar with the workspace process - will need to repeat exercise a few times.
results.content_html: I enjoyed the experience and found the instructions clear. I need to still become familiar with the workspace process - will need to repeat exercise a few times.

results.content: This tutorial is great to get just the basics. Having a background in Edge Animate definitely helped me because there is not much information or description (hence why the tutorial is only 1 hr long). It's basically, "This is how you do it: click here, click there, and boom!" The English is a little hard to understand but after 4 videos or so I got used to the accent and didn't have trouble anymore. Thank you Yashin, I think I can now take what I've learned and build my own skills from here.

response.content:
Thank you Tvoe for this review. The reason why the tutorial is only 1hr long is also because it was completely pre-written before being recorded. That's why everything is direct to the point :)  Don't hesitate to send me a message if you need any help!
Have a nice day!

results.content: I had a difficult time with instructors accent and the transcript was also having a hard time which was no help at all. I had to listen to certain parts a few times which was very frustrating. The timeline info moved faster than the initial info. Instructor did not explain the timing or the alpa.  I think the material was pretty good all-in-all.

results.content:
Exactly what I was looking for! Great course for beginners & previous Flash users who are needing to refresh or brush up skills.

I was very happy with how straight forward and to the point this course was.

results.content: This  tutorial is awesome  and very useful in understanding how to create html 5  banners and animations using Adobe Animate CC.
results.content_html: This tutorial is awesome and very useful in understanding how to create html 5 banners and animations using Adobe Animate CC.

results.content: Its a very nice tutorial, straight to the point and is very useful for animators switching from Flash to HTML5 using Animate CC
results.content_html: Its a very nice tutorial, straight to the point and is very useful for animators switching from Flash to HTML5 using Animate CC

results.content: The best course on Adobe Animate. Its not totally beginner course, at least you should know the concept behind key-frame, movie clip, classic tween etc.  Great thing its mini project based, which is admirable. After watching several time you are good to go. Instructor is knowledgeable and very engaging. straight to the point.

response.content:
Thanks a lot Faisal for this nice review. 
There are many other things that you can do with Animate CC. I'll release a complete guide in the upcoming months, with a new chapter focusing more on scripting.
